sentences.sentence: To me it reflects a particular German moodiness that I know so well.
sentences.translation: 在我眼里这些照片反映的是我所熟知的德国式的忧郁心情。

sentences.sentence: A less extreme and more common measure employed is that of moodiness.
sentences.translation: 一种被使用过的不那么极端又常见的措施是情绪多变。

sentences.sentence: So the 26 moodiness of my usual temper increased to hatred of all things.
sentences.translation: 于是我的脾气越来越坏，开始痛恨一切。
